name: Space Escape (Sigmath Bits)
description:
Run for as long as you can across the buildings of a colonised moon!

Space is to jump between the buildings.

But there is a catch: you have a limited number of space presses! Collect more space presses, or run out and fall to your demise!

This is an infinite runner type game; however, there is technically a hidden way to win! See if you can find it.

A Game Jam game originally made for the Ludum Dare 42 Game Jam with the theme "Running out of space".
